subject: Economy
question_en: What is the fastest-growing state in India in terms of population?
question_hi: भारत के प्रमाण और विकास में सबसे स्पष्ट बढ़ते राज्यों के हिस्सा क्या है?
explanation_en: Gujarat has experienced the fastest growth in population among the states in India.
